name: The Slovak Alliance for Innovation Economy
memberOrga: http://sapie.sk/ - All our members and partners are listed on our website
goal:
The Slovak Alliance for Innovation Economy (SAPIE) has been set up to represent the needs of global and local Internet and innovative companies, improve the state of IT education, boost the startup ecosystem and help companies scale to the global level. Among our members are tech giants as well as globally successful Slovak companies and rising stars.
SAPIE acts as an industry body for these companies, representing them towards policy makers, creates national and regional partnerships and advocates for innovation.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Digitial Single Market Strategy and other policies and initiatives regarding innovation, entrepreneurship and startups
